projects.title: Delightful Gratitude Journal App
projects.summary: The Delightful mobile app is a lightweight gratitude journal for Android & iOS to record 3 good things from your day. Delightful was built with privacy in mind. The app includes backup, prompts, themes, & daily reminders.

projects.title: Blissful Mobile App
projects.summary:
Blissful enabled you to track your mood & record your energy levels along with notes. Blissful's focus was on simplicity & making it easy to see trends in your daily life.
Blissful was the first full-stack product I built from scratch from an idea and wireframe sketches in my notebook. I've unpublished the app but it is still functional and I continue to use it daily.

projects.title: AdNotes Mobile App
projects.summary:
AdNotes is a digital marketing app to create text ads from your mobile phone in the form of expanded text ads. The app is great for digital marketing beginners to gain familiarity with creating text ads.
I created this application when I was actively using Google AdWords and wanted an easy way to see how expanded text ads looked from my phone. The app is open-source.
